Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Emerald
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Evergreen
ShortDescription: #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Ashland, North Avenue, due to fire department activity near Milwaukee/Evergreen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Ashland, North Avenue and Milwaukee, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near Milwaukee/Evergreen.

Allow extra travel time.
